meanings.definition: Exciting or stimulating in a sexual way.
meanings.sent1: The movie had a titillating scene that made everyone blush.
meanings.sent2: The romance novel was full of titillating moments.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's joke about romance was titillating and made the audience giggle.
meanings.sent4: The forbidden love story had a titillating effect on the readers.
meanings.sent5: The spicy salsa dance was so titillating that it left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: Causing a tingling or tickling sensation.
meanings.sent1: The massage oil had a titillating effect on her skin.
meanings.sent2: The feather's touch was light and titillating.
meanings.sent3: The anticipation of the surprise tickled her mind in a titillating way.
meanings.sent4: The icy wind had a titillating chill that ran down his spine.
meanings.sent5: The fizzy soda had a titillating sensation on her tongue.
